prompts: Generate a water-type Pokemon that resembles a starfish and has vibrant colors.
Create a Pokemon with a star shape, featuring intricate patterns and aquatic themes.
Imagine a mystical sea creature with glowing elements and a unique color palette.
Design a Pokemon that is a mix of aquatic and psychic abilities, with a sleek silhouette.
Show me a unique Pokemon with a star-shaped body and a dazzling color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean with a celestial appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that has a star motif and can be found in underwater caves.
